plans_onetime.text: You get: Builder lapel pin. Editorial reports. Swag giveaways. Tyee event discounts. Partner discounts. That warm fuzzy feeling that comes with doing something good.
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus the knowledge that your contribution is enough to cover the entry fee for five access-to-information requests.
You get: Everything in the previous level, and a virtual high-five with Tyee editors.
You get: Everything in the previous level, and an imaginary group hug with The Tyee's newsroom.
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus double the support for our reporters.
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus the knowledge your contribution could cover an equipment upgrade for one of our staff reporters.
You get: You get: Everything in the previous level, and an invitation to an annual dinner with Tyee editors and reporters.
